name: cybernetic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or using cybernetics (= the study of how information is communicated in machines and electronic devices, compared with how information is communicated in the brain and nervous system): In the story, he is given a replacement cybernetic hand. A cybernetic system enables his thought impulses to be converted into actions on a computer.
More examplesFewer examplesImagine a science-fiction thriller where you see through the eyes of a cybernetic organism.They are working at developing a cybernetic helmet that lets you move a cursor using thought alone. He dreamed of military innovations such as a cybernetic tank with a genius IQ.The lower half of the character's body is completely cybernetic.
